channel.title: CVE Feed for DigiWin -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DigiWin -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-7323|2024-08-02T14:02:20.958Z -- digiwin -- easyflow%20.net
item.description: Digiwin EasyFlow .NET lacks proper access control for specific functionality, and the functionality do not adequately filter user input. A remote attacker with regular privilege can exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary files from the remote server .

item.title: CVE-2024-5311|2024-08-01T21:11:12.377Z -- digiwin -- easyflow%20.net
item.description: DigiWin EasyFlow .NET lacks validation for certain input parameters. An unauthenticated remote attacker can inject arbitrary SQL commands to read, modify, and delete database records.

item.title: CVE-2024-5311|2024-06-04T18:01:54.386Z -- digiwin -- easyflow%20.net
item.description: DigiWin EasyFlow .NET lacks validation for certain input parameters. An unauthenticated remote attacker can inject arbitrary SQL commands to read, modify, and delete database records.

item.title: CVE-2024-4893|2024-06-04T17:56:01.777Z -- digiwin -- easyflow%20.net
item.description: DigiWin EasyFlow .NET lacks validation for certain input parameters, allowing remote attackers to inject arbitrary SQL commands. This vulnerability enables unauthorized access to read, modify, and delete database records, as well as execute system commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-4893|2024-08-01T20:55:10.269Z -- digiwin -- easyflow%20.net
item.description: DigiWin EasyFlow .NET lacks validation for certain input parameters, allowing remote attackers to inject arbitrary SQL commands. This vulnerability enables unauthorized access to read, modify, and delete database records, as well as execute system commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-7323|2024-08-02T10:36:51.855Z -- digiwin -- easyflow%20.net
item.description: Digiwin EasyFlow .NET lacks proper access control for specific functionality, and the functionality do not adequately filter user input. A remote attacker with regular privilege can exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary files from the remote server .
